name: CNN
text: Hundreds of people were gathered peacefully tonight at the base of the Lincoln Memorial in Washington, DC — a mix of black and white, young and old, looked out toward the Washington Monument https://t.co/d0UA07V5od

name: CNN
text:
Kentucky Gov. Andy Beshear announced that the state would be reducing its National Guard presence in Louisville.

“That is a recommendation by our adjutant general that we will be following,” Beshear said. https://t.co/tIlUdPgiNO

name: CNN
text: Here are places with curfews Tuesday night due to the protests across the country in response to George Floyd’s death in Minneapolis https://t.co/yk3g1zcuvG

name: CNN
text:
A large, peaceful protest marched through midtown Atlanta on Tuesday before the city's curfew.

"It had gravity and meaning, voices of all creeds united in purpose for what’s right and just," an onlooker who captured a video from his apartment said. https://t.co/HgZZBVJGeG

name: CNN
text: Former Defense Secretary Leon Panetta on President Trump's threat of military force to "dominate" protesters: "Let's use them in battle against our enemies, let's not use them against our own people." https://t.co/wVQSVq5Mqv https://t.co/OFrCcxK5eO

name: CNN
text:
Tuesday was, for many, a day to take a beat.

Social media feeds filled up with blank black boxes. Cities tightened curfews. Americans grappled with their grief and anger. And Wall Street carried on.

Here are the business stories you need to read today. https://t.co/tIL2HiOO7k

name: CNN
text: "George Floyd's death is already affecting millions of precocious black boys and girls...many of whom have taken to the streets to demonstrate both the values of their own lives and to honor those taken from us too soon," writes Peniel Joseph, @CNNOpinion https://t.co/J4NEcHDpx3

name: CNN
text: Aaron Burr played an important part in the advent of the Insurrection Act of 1807, says Gautham Rao, who writes that in 2020, "history is now the barrier" against how President Trump is now trying to use that law to his own ends. | @CNNOpinion https://t.co/d1ehwaljCx

name: CNN
text: "Democracy requires justice and healing in our neighborhoods, not military domination on our streets," writes Jeremi Suri for @CNNOpinion https://t.co/MY4YcjR836

name: CNN
text: After 33 years as the backbone of Delta's domestic fleet, and after nearly four decades plying the world's skies, the once-ubiquitous MD-88 aircraft known as the "Mad Dog" is gone from scheduled airline service, marking the end of an era. https://t.co/E0hCPEPfhJ

name: CNN
text: President Trump says the GOP will be "forced" to find a new state to host their convention because North Carolina is standing by coronavirus measures https://t.co/7k5UPPwJwV

name: CNN
text: The family of a black man killed by a white bar owner during protests in Omaha, Nebraska, believes a prosecutor rushed to judgment by declaring the shooting an act of self-defense https://t.co/czASegQl4V
